question: JIMEX is a maritime exercise between which two nations?
explanation:
India and Japan would shortly commence a 2-day maritime drill in the northern Arabian Sea. The India Japan Maritime Bilateral Exercise (JIMEX) is conducted biennially.
Last time the exercise was conducted in 2018 off the coast of Visakhapatnam. In view of the COVID restrictions, the JIMEX 20 exercise is proposed to be conducted in a â€œnon-contact at-sea-only format".
